quests.name: Bring me some apples
quests.questIntroductionLine:
Hello, my dear boy. Could you bring me two apples? 
I need them for my apple pie.
quests.questNotFinishedLine:
Take your time. I need good quality apples 
for my apple pie.
quests.questFinishedLine:
Great job, my dear boy. 
I think you deserve something for that.

quests.name: Mouse problem
quests.questIntroductionLine:
My boy, a mouse hides somewhere here.
Could you please catch it and bring to me?
quests.questNotFinishedLine: I'm sure this mouse is somewhere here...
quests.questFinishedLine: Here it is! Great job, my boy.

quests.name: Cooking with Grandma
quests.questIntroductionLine:
Boy, do you have that piece of meat I gave you?
I'm a bit hungry. Could you cook it for 
your beloved granny?
quests.questNotFinishedLine:
Grab some logs and take them to campfire.
Then you can cook anything.
quests.questFinishedLine: Yes, meat.... Thank you, my boy.

quests.name: Where is my staff?
quests.questIntroductionLine:
Boy, I lost my favourite staff.
It should be somewhere nearby. Could you find it?
quests.questNotFinishedLine: My lovely staff... Where are you?
quests.questFinishedLine:
My staff... you have my biggest gratitude, my boy.
What is that? A strange rabbit attacked you?
I don't know if I should tell you about them...

quests.name: The Void
quests.questIntroductionLine:
Okay, dear boy... they came out of the Void.
Very dark and mysterious place...
quests.questNotFinishedLine:
If anything gets into the Void...
it changes into bloodthirsty creature...
quests.questFinishedLine:
You should talk with Diego... 
he knows more about those creatures.

quests.name: What is the Void?
quests.questIntroductionLine:
Hey there. I'm Diego.
Granny has sent you?
quests.questNotFinishedLine:
You want to know more about the Void?
We can talk about it, sure.
quests.questFinishedLine:
But if you want to do it right now, you have to go with me.
I'm going to Dracania. I have some businesses to do there.
